uk.ac.aber.group14.controller

Interface IWalkController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WalkController

    public interface IWalkController
    This interface is used to control a class which implements the IWalk interface. It can add Points of Interest and Locations, as well as canceling the walk, returning whether the walk can be uploaded, and compiling the walk into JSON.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLocation(Location location)
      This method is used to add GPS Locations to the walk's list of Locations
      void addPOI(IPointOfInterest point)
      This method is used to add a class implementing IPointOfInterest to the walk's list of IPointOfInterest
      void cancelWalk()
      This method is used to cancel the walk.
      boolean canUpload()
      This method is used to determine whether or not the walk meets the requirements to upload to the server.
      java.lang.String compileWalk()
      This method is used to compile the walk into a String representing it in JSON

    • Method Detail

      • addPOI

        void addPOI(IPointOfInterest point)
        This method is used to add a class implementing IPointOfInterest to the walk's list of IPointOfInterest
        Parameters:
        point - The IPointOfInterest to add to the walk

      • cancelWalk

        void cancelWalk()
        This method is used to cancel the walk.

      • compileWalk

        java.lang.String compileWalk()
        This method is used to compile the walk into a String representing it in JSON
        Returns:
        A String representing the walk as a JSON object

      • addLocation

        void addLocation(Location location)
        This method is used to add GPS Locations to the walk's list of Locations
        Parameters:
        location - The location to add to the walk's list of locations

      • canUpload

        boolean canUpload()
        This method is used to determine whether or not the walk meets the requirements to upload to the server. We require at least one IPointOfInterest and Location.
        Returns:
        True or false, depending on whether the walk can be uploaded
